allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add blog page with shadcn components and enhance Builder.io integration

- Add new blog section with article layout and prose styling
- Add Shadcn UI components: alert, avatar, breadcrumb, separator
- Install @tailwindcss/typography plugin for rich text content
- Add date-fns for date formatting
- Install required Radix UI dependencies
- Enhance Builder.io registry with organized insert menu sections
- Add comprehensive prose CSS styles for article content
- Update project documentation with commit guidelines
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Enhance blog page with SEO metadata and add CTA5 component

- Add dynamic meta tags (description, keywords, OG tags, Twitter card) in blog post page
- Format and display blog post date (MM-DD-YYYY format) above content
- Add blog post title display with proper styling
- Update global CSS to target all h1 elements in Builder content blocks
- Register new Eminent Image w/Content (CTA5) component with Builder.io
- Add configurable layout variants (image-left, image-right, image-top) for CTA5
- Support rich text description and optional caption for CTA5
- Add CTA5 to Eminent Blocks insert menu
EOF
)")
